{-# LINE 60 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

-- Handle brokenness on some BSD variants, notably OS X up to at least
-- 10.6.  If NOTE_EOF isn't available, we have no way to receive a
-- notification from the kernel when we reach EOF on a plain file.

{-# LINE 67 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

available :: Bool
available = True
{-# INLINE available #-}

------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Exported interface

data EventQueue = EventQueue {
      eqFd       :: {-# UNPACK #-} !QueueFd
    , eqChanges  :: {-# UNPACK #-} !(MVar (A.Array Event))
    , eqEvents   :: {-# UNPACK #-} !(A.Array Event)
    }

new :: IO E.Backend
new = do
  qfd <- kqueue
  changesArr <- A.empty
  changes <- newMVar changesArr 
  events <- A.new 64
  let !be = E.backend poll modifyFd delete (EventQueue qfd changes events)
  return be

delete :: EventQueue -> IO ()
delete q = do
  _ <- c_close . fromQueueFd . eqFd $ q
  return ()

modifyFd :: EventQueue -> Fd -> E.Event -> E.Event -> IO ()
modifyFd q fd oevt nevt = withMVar (eqChanges q) $ \ch -> do
  let addChange filt flag = A.snoc ch $ event fd filt flag noteEOF
  when (oevt `E.eventIs` E.evtRead)  $ addChange filterRead flagDelete
  when (oevt `E.eventIs` E.evtWrite) $ addChange filterWrite flagDelete
  when (nevt `E.eventIs` E.evtRead)  $ addChange filterRead flagAdd
  when (nevt `E.eventIs` E.evtWrite) $ addChange filterWrite flagAdd

poll :: EventQueue
     -> Timeout
     -> (Fd -> E.Event -> IO ())
     -> IO ()
poll EventQueue{..} tout f = do
    changesArr <- A.empty
    changes <- swapMVar eqChanges changesArr
    changesLen <- A.length changes
    len <- A.length eqEvents
    when (changesLen > len) $ A.ensureCapacity eqEvents (2 * changesLen)
    n <- A.useAsPtr changes $ \changesPtr chLen ->
           A.unsafeLoad eqEvents $ \evPtr evCap ->
             withTimeSpec (fromTimeout tout) $
               kevent eqFd changesPtr chLen evPtr evCap

    unless (n == 0) $ do
        cap <- A.capacity eqEvents
        when (n == cap) $ A.ensureCapacity eqEvents (2 * cap)
        A.forM_ eqEvents $ \e -> f (fromIntegral (ident e)) (toEvent (filter e))

------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- FFI binding

newtype QueueFd = QueueFd {
      fromQueueFd :: CInt
    } deriving (Eq, Show)


{-# LINE 131 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
data Event = KEvent64 {
      ident  :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Word64
    , filter :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Filter
    , flags  :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Flag
    , fflags :: {-# UNPACK #-} !FFlag
    , data_  :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Int64
    , udata  :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Word64
    , ext0   :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Word64
    , ext1   :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Word64
    } deriving Show

event :: Fd -> Filter -> Flag -> FFlag -> Event
event fd filt flag fflag = KEvent64 (fromIntegral fd) filt flag fflag 0 0 0 0

instance Storable Event where
    sizeOf _ = (48)
{-# LINE 147 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
    alignment _ = alignment (undefined :: CInt)

    peek ptr = do
        ident'  <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 0) ptr
{-# LINE 151 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        filter' <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 8) ptr
{-# LINE 152 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        flags'  <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 10) ptr
{-# LINE 153 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        fflags' <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 12) ptr
{-# LINE 154 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        data'   <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 16) ptr
{-# LINE 155 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        udata'  <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 24) ptr
{-# LINE 156 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        ext0'   <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 32) ptr
{-# LINE 157 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        ext1'   <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 40) ptr
{-# LINE 158 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        let !ev = KEvent64 ident' (Filter filter') (Flag flags') fflags' data'
                           udata' ext0' ext1'
        return ev

    poke ptr ev = do
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 0) ptr (ident ev)
{-# LINE 164 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 8) ptr (filter ev)
{-# LINE 165 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 10) ptr (flags ev)
{-# LINE 166 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 12) ptr (fflags ev)
{-# LINE 167 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 16) ptr (data_ ev)
{-# LINE 168 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 24) ptr (udata ev)
{-# LINE 169 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 32) ptr (ext0 ev)
{-# LINE 170 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 40) ptr (ext1 ev)
{-# LINE 171 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

{-# LINE 211 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

newtype FFlag = FFlag Word32
    deriving (Eq, Show, Storable)

noteEOF  :: FFlag
noteEOF  = FFlag 0

{-# LINE 218 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}


{-# LINE 222 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
newtype Flag = Flag Word16

{-# LINE 224 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
    deriving (Eq, Show, Storable)

flagAdd      :: Flag
flagAdd      = Flag 1
flagDelete   :: Flag
flagDelete   = Flag 2

{-# LINE 230 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}


{-# LINE 234 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
newtype Filter = Filter Word16

{-# LINE 236 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
    deriving (Bits, Eq, Num, Show, Storable)

filterRead    :: Filter
filterRead    = Filter (-1)
filterWrite   :: Filter
filterWrite   = Filter (-2)

{-# LINE 242 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

data TimeSpec = TimeSpec {
      tv_sec  :: {-# UNPACK #-} !CTime
    , tv_nsec :: {-# UNPACK #-} !CLong
    }

instance Storable TimeSpec where
    sizeOf _ = (16)
{-# LINE 250 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
    alignment _ = alignment (undefined :: CInt)

    peek ptr = do
        tv_sec'  <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 0) ptr
{-# LINE 254 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        tv_nsec' <- (\hsc_ptr -> peekByteOff hsc_ptr 8) ptr
{-# LINE 255 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        let !ts = TimeSpec tv_sec' tv_nsec'
        return ts

    poke ptr ts = do
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 0) ptr (tv_sec ts)
{-# LINE 260 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
        (\hsc_ptr -> pokeByteOff hsc_ptr 8) ptr (tv_nsec ts)
{-# LINE 261 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

kqueue :: IO QueueFd
kqueue = QueueFd `fmap` throwErrnoIfMinus1 "kqueue" c_kqueue

-- TODO: We cannot retry on EINTR as the timeout would be wrong.
-- Perhaps we should just return without calling any callbacks.
kevent :: QueueFd -> Ptr Event -> Int -> Ptr Event -> Int -> Ptr TimeSpec
       -> IO Int
kevent k chs chlen evs evlen ts
    = fmap fromIntegral $ E.throwErrnoIfMinus1NoRetry "kevent" $

{-# LINE 272 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
      c_kevent64 k chs (fromIntegral chlen) evs (fromIntegral evlen) 0 ts

{-# LINE 276 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}

withTimeSpec :: TimeSpec -> (Ptr TimeSpec -> IO a) -> IO a
withTimeSpec ts f =
    if tv_sec ts < 0 then
        f nullPtr
      else
        alloca $ \ptr -> poke ptr ts >> f ptr

fromTimeout :: Timeout -> TimeSpec
fromTimeout Forever     = TimeSpec (-1) (-1)
fromTimeout (Timeout s) = TimeSpec (toEnum sec) (toEnum nanosec)
  where
    sec :: Int
    sec     = floor s

    nanosec :: Int
    nanosec = ceiling $ (s - fromIntegral sec) * 1000000000

toEvent :: Filter -> E.Event
toEvent (Filter f)
    | f == (-1) = E.evtRead
{-# LINE 297 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
    | f == (-2) = E.evtWrite
{-# LINE 298 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
    | otherwise = error $ "toEvent: unknown filter " ++ show f

foreign import ccall unsafe "kqueue"
    c_kqueue :: IO CInt


{-# LINE 304 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
foreign import ccall safe "kevent64"
    c_kevent64 :: QueueFd -> Ptr Event -> CInt -> Ptr Event -> CInt -> CUInt
               -> Ptr TimeSpec -> IO CInt

{-# LINE 314 "libraries/base/GHC/Event/KQueue.hsc" #-}
